org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface Item

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Item, RichTextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Item, RichTextItem

    public interface Item
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF extensions to Item class

    • Method Summary

      Gets the last modified date of the Item, casting it to a Java Date

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        <T> T getValues(Class<?> T)
        Gets the values, casting them to the class passed in, e.g. ArrayList.class
        Parameters:
        T - Class to return values as
        Returns:
        values as an instance of Class T
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • getLastModifiedDate

        Date getLastModifiedDate()
        Gets the last modified date of the Item, casting it to a Java Date
        Returns:
        Date the Item was last modified
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 2.5.0

      • hasFlag

        boolean hasFlag(Item.Flags flag)
        Helper method to allow consistent access to whether the Item has certain flags, rather than calling the relevant getters. Possible flags are:
        • Flags.PROTECTED
        • Flags.AUTHORS
        • Flags.ENCRYPTED
        • Flags.NAMES
        • Flags.READERS
        • Flags.SIGNED
        • Flags.SUMMARY
        Authors, Readers and Names are included here because Item.getType() does not necessarily identify this
        Parameters:
        flag - Flags enum
        Returns:
        whether the item has the relevant flag
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isReadersNamesAuthors

        boolean isReadersNamesAuthors()
        Checks whether an Item is one of either Names, Readers or Authors
        Returns:
        true if the Item has Flags.NAMES, Flags.READERS or Flags.AUTHORS flag
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • markDirty

        void markDirty()
        Sets the underlying document dirty.

      • getTypeEx

        Item.Type getTypeEx()
        Returns the Item.Type of the Item as Type object
        Returns:
        the Item.Type of the Item
